title: 有什么插件是可以防工业爆炸么
txt_content: 防核爆或者反应仓爆炸

replies.author: Coloured_glaze
replies.txt_content:
可修改 config/IC2.ini
找到
; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 1
; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 1
修改为1
即可爆炸无破坏
不毁自身可设置为0

Coloured_glaze 发表于 2019-3-26 10:42
可修改 config/IC2.ini
找到
; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.
服务器的么？
